tool.arguments: ${CUR_JOB_ROOT} [-I ${Input SEM spec file type="file" tooltip="Input SEM spec file"}] [-O ${Output SEM Spec file tooltip="Output SEM Spec file, if path is empty, then write out spec file under job path"}] [-r ${reuse FEM+ pattern align correction job results? type="char_cb" option="yes|no" default="yes" tooltip="Whether to reuse the FEM+ pattern align correction job results"}] [-u ${reuse FEM+ pattern align correction job lua? type="char_cb" option="yes|no" default="no" tooltip="Whether to reuse the FEM+ pattern align correction job lua"}]
tool.name: FEM+ D2DB correction debug
